text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q1

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q1-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q1-2Mild (Feelings of sadness, discouragement, low selfesteem, pessimism) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q1-3Mild (Feelings of sadness, discouragement, low selfesteem, pessimism) and Occasional
    Q1-4Mild (Feelings of sadness, discouragement, low selfesteem, pessimism) and Much of the time
    Q1-5Mild (Feelings of sadness, discouragement, low selfesteem, pessimism) and Almost all the time
    Q1-6Moderate (Clear nonverbal signs of sadness, feelings of hopelessness, helplessness, or worthlessness about some aspects of life) and Occasional
    Q1-7Moderate (Clear nonverbal signs of sadness, feelings of hopelessness, helplessness, or worthlessness about some aspects of life) and Much of the time
    Q1-8Moderate (Clear nonverbal signs of sadness, feelings of hopelessness, helplessness, or worthlessness about some aspects of life) and Almost all the time
    Q1-9Severe (Intense sadness, hopelessness about most aspects of life, feelings of complete helplessness or worthlessness) and Occasional
    Q1-10Severe (Intense sadness, hopelessness about most aspects of life, feelings of complete helplessness or worthlessness) and Much of the time
    Q1-11Severe (Intense sadness, hopelessness about most aspects of life, feelings of complete helplessness or worthlessness) and almost all of the time
    Q1-12Very severe (Extreme sadness; intractable hopelessness or helplessness) and Occasional
    Q1-13Very severe (Extreme sadness; intractable hopelessness or helplessness) and Much off the time
    Q1-14Very severe (Extreme sadness; intractable hopelessness or helplessness) and Almost all of the time
